The People's Group seen the blasts from Injector, and all of them moved
except for Scamrock, who wanted them to bring it on! Scamrock was hit with
everyone's blasts including the autoguns, he stood, looking rather worked
like he had just did a job. (Wrestling talk for looking like he got beat up
and then lost) Suukie drew out the heavy blaster rifle from Dracona in one
hand and fired at the base some more. Sinesis and Sinister just walked right
through the fire, not even one autogun fired at them. Plintissa was shocked!
How could they be immune to the defenses? Then it occured to the whole
group. Sinister and Sinesis spun around and opened fire on the People's
Group, their true allegiance being with the Predacons!...

OCC: The autoguns protected by the shields cannot be shot, but rhey can
shoot through the shields? That doesn't seem right...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 9:55 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Just to let you know, Code, the Predacon's base's shields ARE up, so not
all
> of the autoguns will be able to be shot)
>
> Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Double Punch/Hiss/Breakdown:
>
> Injector, Manterror, and Bumblebee each reached a seperate hatch.
Strangely,
> each called to Double Punch via comlink asking where the attackers were.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch yelled, kicing at the ground.  Looking wildly through the
> scanners, he found the People's Group all around.  Bringing more autoguns
> online to open fire on them, the shields starting to weaken and a few
> autoguns not in the protection of the shield being destroyed, he replied
to
> the three Predacons who had contacted him, telling them the coordinates.
>
> ---
>
> Injector opened his hatch, seeing some of the People's group.  Firing a
> double blast of optic lasers randomly at the People's group, he fired off
> three stinger missiles off at more random targets.
>
> ---
>
> Manterror opened his hatch slightly, firing off two ion disks at the
People's
> group randomly.
>
> ---
>
> Bumblebee opened a hatch, firing three stinger missiles from both of his
> stinger missile launchers at Scamrock, two optic blasts firing randomly.
>
> ---
>
> "Idiots!" Double Punch yelled, activating internal defenses, not aware
that
> the counter assaulting Predacons would be protected by shields.
>
> ============
>
> Breakdown awoke slowly, cursing.  Kicking Hiss, who began to wake up.
>
> ---
>
> "What?!" Hiss yelled, standing slowly.
>
> ---
>
> "Let's get to the Predacon base.  The Maxis betrayed us!"  Activating his
com
> as they both ran, Breakdown spoke with Zardus.  <Zardus, this is
Breakdown,
> we were jumped by the Maximals!  They must've took us for dead.  We've
been
> double crossed, and those stinking Maximals are doing the crossing!  We're
> heading to the Pred base!>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Life's too short to send boring email. Let SuperSig come to the rescue.
> http://click.egroups.com/1/5108/10/_/_/_/960774920/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
